name: Benyamin
description: A passionate web developer with experience in building social platforms and tourism-related services.

projects.title: Eventoment
projects.description: A comprehensive platform for organizing and managing events and activities. Users can create, manage, and share events, as well as participate in others' events.

projects.title: Tourism Reservation System
projects.description: Developed a reservation system for tours and leisure activities, including a bus ticket booking service.

workExperience.title: Team Leader
responsibilities: Led the development of Eventoment, a social platform for event management.
Implemented technologies such as Vue.js, Nuxt.js, Laravel, and REST API.
Designed and developed an event management system allowing users to create, edit, and manage events.
Used Firebase for push notifications and applied design patterns for efficient development.
Designed and implemented the database structure for the project.

workExperience.title: Developer
responsibilities: Created a bus ticket reservation web service.
Developed a tourism and leisure reservation system.
